summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackBubble's Soft Launch Hydrating Cream Cleanser is a delicate daily cleanser designed for dry, sensitive skin. This light, creamy formula lathers into a soft foam that cleans without leaving skin feeling stripped, tight, or dry. Use Soft Launch on its own or as the second step in a double cleanse.
details: DetailsBenefitsIdeal for dry, sensitive skinLight foam cleans without strippingLeaves skin feeling nourished95% said itâ€™s gentle on sensitive skin* (study of 104 testers over 4 days)Key IngredientsAllantoin helps soften, moisturize, and soothe skin.Avocado Oil helps nourish skin and reduce redness; its naturally high content of vitamins and essential fatty acids simultaneously softens and moisturizes.Plant-Based Ceramides replenish the natural building blocks of your skin barrier.Formulated WithoutDenatured alcoholsAdded fragranceParabensArtificial colorItem 2626625How To UseMassage 1-2 pumps onto wet skin to create a light foam. Rinse well and pat dry. Use morning and night.IngredientsWater (Aqua), CocamidopropylHydroxysultaine, Behenyl Alcohol,Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6,Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate,Pentylene Glycol, Glycolipids,Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Allantoin,Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP,Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, SodiumPhytate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate,Polylysine, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol,Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, XanthanGum, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, StearylAlcohol, Citric Acid, TrisodiumEthylenediamine Disuccinate,Polyglyceryl-6 Dicaprate,Ethylehexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Massage 1-2 pumps onto wet skin to create a light foam. Rinse well and pat dry. Use morning and night.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: Love it! Leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean.

reviews.headline: Love but
reviews.comments: Love this cleanser but the pump sucks, it barely works

reviews.headline: Works Great even on Sensitve Faces!
reviews.comments: Really like this face cleaner. It leaves my face clean and hydrated. I use as my second step cleansing on mornings when I need to be gentler on my face and it has worked great. It doesn't seem to suds up at all for me but that is not a deal breaker for me just thought it should be noted.

reviews.headline: Great for dry skin!
reviews.comments: I'm new to skin care and I have dry, acne-prone, and slightly sensitive skin. I feel like every cleanser I've tried feels stripping and makes my face feeling dull and dehydrated. This cleanser makes my skin feel SO refreshed! I actually look forward to washing my face now! It's easy to rinse off and doesn't leave a film or residue like other cleansers I've tried. I recommend this if you're new to skin care like me because it's easy to incorporate into your routine. I can obviously only speak for myself but I haven't noticed any breakouts or irritation, so I'd give it a shot if you have sensitive or dry skin!

reviews.headline: Nice cleanser!
reviews.comments: I'm really liking this cleanser a lot! It makes my face nice and clean and leaves my skin soft and hydrating after use. Can't wait to check out more products from Bubble!

reviews.headline: I love this!!!ï¿¼
reviews.comments: This is so soft on my face and it never leaves my skin irritated I prefer this over their other cleansers because it's not as sticky and it feels more like a moisturizer. I love it so much. You should definitely get it.

reviews.headline: Worth the buy!
reviews.comments: This face wash feels nice on the skin. If you like cervae, then you'll enjoy this! It gives the skin a nice cleanse and I love that it's a clean brand! Safe for my daughter and I to use!

reviews.headline: I love it soooo muchhhh
reviews.comments: I love this so much my slin feels so hydrated and somehow some if my pimpls went away i would 1000% recommend this to anyone! I live it so much

reviews.headline: A dream for makeup removal
reviews.comments: The textute of this is so nice. It removes makeup so easily. I love it.

reviews.headline: Pretty good
reviews.comments: I like this product but it is not the most effective. It works fine, but I have more sensitive skin and found it cleans, but not as well as I would like. Still a good product though.

reviews.headline: Omg so great
reviews.comments: Ok what!!!! This is so great. It doesnt leave my face all sticky like EVERY OTHER cleanser i have tried. It removes makeup and doesn't burn my eyes. It also moisturizes and feels nice

reviews.headline: I actually really like this product
reviews.comments: This product is good I just don't like the smell, but it really works on my skin

reviews.headline: Immediate NOPE
reviews.comments: I recently have been getting into bubble products and have loved them so far. I'm on the hunt for an affordable face wash for my dry, sensitive skin. I had high hopes for this one given the reviews and bubble marketing for sensitibe skin types. It was HORRIBLE. Felt nice going on, until i rinse it off and looked at my face in the mirror. I could see red splotches all over my face that were getting larger. I have NEVER had this kind of reaction to any face wash before. No clue what's in it was the problem, but I would stay far away if you have sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Finally a non-drying cleanser
reviews.comments: I've been an avid and loyal user of the Vanacream brand for years. But in the winter months when my skin is more dry, I needed something less harsh. This is that product!! No redness on my ultra-sensitive skin, and it left my skin both clean and hydrated. Definitely my new favorite cleanser.

reviews.headline: Really nice cream cleanser!
reviews.comments: This cleanser feels great on my skin and keft it with glowing results. It doenst smell like anything which is great imo because i have very sensitive skin and scents can bother my skin. After using this cleanser your skin feels soft and hydrated. I would def recommend this cleanser âœ¨

reviews.headline: Made my skin soft, but broke me out
reviews.comments: My skin is incredibly sensitive and acne prone. I decided to try this based on all the positive reviews for my skin type. Unfortunately it broke me out really badly, which is too bad because I otherwise really like it.

reviews.headline: BUBBLE COOKED
reviews.comments: I LOVE THIS PROTUCE SO MUCH IS IS AMZAING NGL.

reviews.headline: Super good!
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser so much. It is very cute and aesthetically pleasing. It helps me with breakouts and just to cleanse my face in the morning and at night. It is best for dry skin and senstive skin which is my skin type. If  you were thinking about getting it, you should get it.

reviews.headline: Super good!
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser so much. It is very cute and aesthetically pleasing. It helps me with breakouts and just to cleanse my face in the morning and at night. It is best for dry skin and senstive skin which is my skin type. If  you were thinking about getting it, you should get it.

reviews.headline: Good Product
reviews.comments: I bought this on a whim when I had lost my face wash at home and I enjoy a cream wash vs a foaming wash. This face wash leaves my skin feeling so soft and smooth and gives a little bounce. My only problem is I need to remember to take off the cap before I start washing because it is impossible to remove with wet hands

media.headline: I wanted to like this product more
I wanted to like this product more

faceoff_positive.comments: Bubble's new skincare product, introduced in their recent soft launch, is a refreshing addition to the beauty market. The product in question, the Bubble Dewy Glow Moisturizer, promises to revolutionize daily skincare routines with its unique formulation and impressive results. The packaging of the Dewy Glow Moisturizer is both stylish and practical. Housed in a sleek, pastel-colored jar, it features an airless pump design to maintain the product's freshness and potency. This thoughtful design also ensures hygiene and ease of use, making it a standout in terms of functionality. The moisturizer itself is lightweight with a silky texture that glides effortlessly onto the skin. It's formulated with a blend of hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and squalane, which are known for their hydrating and skin-brightening properties. Upon application, the Dewy Glow Moisturizer absorbs quickly, leaving the skin feeling incredibly soft and supple without any greasy residue. One of the most remarkable aspects of this product is its immediate effect. Right after the first use, the skin appears more radiant and plump. Over the course of a week, consistent use resulted in noticeable improvements in skin texture and hydration. Fine lines were visibly reduced, and the overall complexion had a healthy, dewy glow. The Dewy Glow Moisturizer is also fragrance-free, making it suitable for sensitive skin. Its gentle formula did not cause any irritation or breakouts, even on reactive skin types. Additionally, the inclusion of niacinamide helped to even out skin tone and reduce redness, further enhancing its appeal. Bubble's commitment to clean beauty is evident in the Dewy Glow Moisturizer. It is free from parabens, sulfates, and artificial dyes, aligning with the brand's ethos of providing safe and effective skincare solutions. Overall, the soft launch of the Dewy Glow Moisturizer by Bubble has been a success. It is a highly effective product that delivers on its promises, providing deep hydration and a luminous complexion. As it becomes more widely available, it is likely to become a staple in many skincare routines.
